snippet.title: Guardians First Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
We have to save our homeland from chaos. 
From darkness to light...
Hello, fellow gamers! 🎮 We're beyond excited to give you the first glimpse of our upcoming game - Guardians. Adventure, and epic battles awaits you. This is just the beginning, so stay tuned for more updates and sneak peeks!
